name: crowdfunding-platform-autotest
description: A simple automation test project for a crowdfunding platform with selenium-webdriver

scripts.test:regression: npx mocha Tests/Crowdfunding --recursive  --timeout=30000 --reporter mochawesome --require mochawesome/register --require Configs/RootHooks.js
scripts.test:regression-parallel: npx mocha Tests/Crowdfunding/ --recursive --parallel --timeout=30000 --reporter mochawesome --require mochawesome/register --require Configs/RootHooks.js

author: Thai Le
